CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 21, 1958, pg. 28, reads: "Open Civic Opera Season - Some of the members of the cast of America's only real folk opera, 'Porgy and Bess,' caught by The Courier photographer, prior to the opening curtain of the Civic Light Opera's 13th season at Pitt Stadium, Monday night. Left to right: Andrew Frierson, 'Porgy;' Urylee Leonardos, 'Bess;' 'Porgy's' goat; Pittsburgh's own Irving Barnes, 'Jake;' Jerry Laws, 'Mingo,' and Sharane McCurry who plays the role of 'Child' in the production. All performed admirable. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors, cast members of Civic Light Opera "Porgy and Bess," from left: Andrew Frierson, Urylee Leonardos, Irving Barnes wearing sash inscribed "Repent Ye Saith The Lord" and holding leash of goat, Jerry Laws, and young Sharane McCurry standing on lawn
